org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats

Packages that use org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats
Package
Description
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats
 
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats.mtc
 
  • Classes in org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats used by org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats
    Class
    Description
    GoTerm2PValAndCounts
    This class is used to store the numbers we need to calculate a P Value for individual GO Terms using the Term for Term approach and also to store the numbers of study and population genes that were annotated to the term
    Hypergeometric
    Class with static methods to calculate probabilities according to the hypergeometric distribution.
    ParentChildPValuesCalculation
    Grossmann S, Bauer S, Robinson PN, Vingron M.
    ParentChildPValuesCalculation.Counts
    Counts is a convenience class used to help calculate the hypergeometric p values for the Parent Child meethods.
    PValue
    This class is used to store an item (an ontology TermId) and its associated raw and adjusted p values.
    PValueCalculation
    Abstract base class for methods that calculate a p-values for ontology term overrepresentation.

    PValue
    This class is used to store an item (an ontology TermId) and its associated raw and adjusted p values.
